Does battling in lower battles "damage" my fame?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher DS Archive (DS): Monster Rancher DS: General QA: Does battling in lower battles "damage" my fame?
By jamesccg on Sunday, August 8, 2010 - 10:57 am:

Im on "D" and did a "E" battle and it didnt do any I can tell.

By Thorr on Sunday, August 8, 2010 - 01:05 pm:

You are allowed to go up to 2 ranks below. Continually tanking the rank can result in lower fame.
